titleStmt.title: By the Council of State. The Council of State taking notice of the tumultuous and barbarous actings at the New-Exchange ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Council of State.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Henry Hills Printer to the Council of State,

notesStmt.note: Dated and signed at end: Saturday 10. December 1653. John Thurloe Sec.
Reproductions of the originals in the British Library (Thomason Tracts) and in the Harvard University Library (Early English Books).
